articles.title: Pyongyang City Army-People Meeting Hail Successful Launch of Satellite
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Army-People Meeting Hail Successful Launch of Satellite
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang city army-people meeting for hailing the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 took place Monday
					 Kim Il Sung Square and the plaza of the Tower of the Juche Idea were crowded with over 150,000 people full of national pride and self-esteem of masters of the space power who demonstrated the dignity and might of the great Kim Il Sung's, Kim Jong Il's and Kim Jong Un's Korea and the overall might of Juche Korea.
					
					 Present there were leading officials of the party, state and army, officials of the armed forces organs, ministry and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and officials and working people of organs and industrial establishments and youths and students in the city.
					
					 Taking the review stands were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 A report of the National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK on the launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 was read out to be followed by congratulatory speeches.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said that the successful launch of the satellite of Juche, a great national auspicious event, once again demonstrated the independent right of the great Paektusan nation and its tremendous might and instilled great confidence and optimism about the final victory into all the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the forces following them are making provocation, calling the successful launch of the satellite a "challenge" and "violation" but satellites of Juche will continue to fly into the blue sky of the country, he said.
					
					 Yun Tong Hyon, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, said that the complete success of Kwangmyongsong-4 proved that the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea is a scientific and technological power and a space power.
					
					 Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, pledged to solve at the fastest speed and level scientific and technological problems for increasing the defence capabilities of the country, building an economic power and improving the people's standard of living and put all the fields of science and technology on the up-to-date basis with the revolutionary faith of Paektu, the sprit of the blizzards of Paektu and the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, said that the speed of advance of the large contingent of youths bringing earlier the bright morrow of prosperity in close unity around Marshal Kim Jong Un will be more accelerated and whoever tries to dare infringe upon the independent dignity and the legitimate right of Korea will never be able evade powerful punishment of Korean youths.

articles.title: Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Fireworks Displayed in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in Pyongyang on Monday to congratulate the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 Crowded with service personnel, working people and school youth and children were at Kim Il Sung Square, Mansu Hill, Okryu Bridge centering on the River Taedong where the Tower of the Juche Idea rises up and other places of Pyongyang.
					
					 Fireworks of celebration were displayed to beautifully decorate the nocturnal sky of the capital city.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- There took place a dancing party of youth and students at Kim Il Sung Square on Feb. 8. 
					 The dancing party began with song "Joy of the People".
					
					 The dancers joyfully danced full of pride and joy of living and struggling at the socialist country which is legitimately exercising the right to use space for independent and peaceful purposes as it is holding another peerlessly great man. 
					
					 They danced to the tunes of songs "Train to the Front," "July 27 March", etc. with the will to mercilessly punish those who tries to dare provoke the independent dignity and legitimate right of the DPRK, rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un in the same spirit as it occupied the space.

articles.title: Floral Tributes Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tributes Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people across the country paid profound tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Monday in honor of the significant birth anniversary of the regular armed forces of the DPRK and the Lunar New Year's Day of Juche 105 (2016). 
					 A lot of people visited the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill in boundless reverence for them. 
					
					 Standing before their statues was a floral basket sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries, national institutions, organs, industrial establishments at all levels and schools in the city, and bouquets and flowers. 
					
					 The visitors made deep bows before the statues. 
					
					 Service personnel, people from different social standings and school youth and children visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio, military academies and large combined units of the Korean People's Army to pay floral tribute. 
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children in local areas also visited the statues of the great leaders and mosaics depicting smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: Trade Union Officials Visit Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Trade Union Officials Visit Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea made a study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu from Feb. 3 to 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The members of the expedition group held a meeting for declaring the start in front of the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo on Feb. 3.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called for deeply grasping the revolutionary history and exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu associated in the battle sites during the anti-Japanese revolution and defending and glorifying the party's revolutionary traditions.
					
					 Upon arrival at Pochonbo the members of the expedition group looked round the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, post office, the sub-county office and the fire station, after being briefed about them before the statue of the President.
					
					 They visited Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site and Chongbong Bivouac after going through Spring Site in Poso-ri and Tableland of Junghung. They looked round the site of headquarters and the site of campfire.
					
					 They then visited Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp where they felt strong yearnings for him in front of relics showing his childhood.
					
					 A pledge meeting of the officials of the trade union took place in front of the old home.
					
					 The visit to the Samjiyon Grand Monument helped the visitors call back the intense loyalty and reverence of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners and people for the President and the indomitable fighting spirit of the members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army.
					
					 They marched along Kapsan-Musan guard road and went round the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area and also visited the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station.
					
					 They also helped clean the revolutionary battle sites and conduct colorful political and cultural activities.

articles.title: Launch of Satellite, Independent Right of DPRK
articles.content:
Launch of Satellite, Independent Right of DPRK
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- All the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have greeted the Lunar New Year's Day of Juche 105 (2016) and the 68th anniversary of the revolutionary regular armed forces, with great pleasure over the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 Jo Hong Gun, a general officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 The successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 is a national historic event that fully exercised an independent right of the Korean nation to peaceful use of space.
					
					 The launch of the satellite showed off the strong will of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un that no force on earth can hold in check the grand drive of Songun Korea.
					
					 On receipt of the news, officers and men of our unit dance for joy.
					
					 Hong Chol Hwa, director of the Law Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, said that though the hostile forces are making every desperate effort, they can not turn back the wheel of history.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Our satellites, displaying the justness of the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of attaching importance to science and technology, will take flight in the vast open air more and more.

articles.title: Lunar New Year's Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Lunar New Year's Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- All the service personnel and people of the DPRK greeted the Lunar New Year's Day with happiness and joys. 
					 A lot of people went to the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, sacred temple of Juche where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state. 
					
					 The visitors made bows before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of the great leaders and mosaics depicting their smiling images on Mansu Hill and different places of the country to pay tribute to them. 
					
					 Multifarious art performances were given at the theatres in the capital and local areas. 
					
					 Schoolchildren across the country joyfully played folk games and sporting and amusement games. 
					
					 Competition of kite-flying and other colorful folk games took place at Kim Il Sung Square, the plaza of the Arch of Triumph and other places of Pyongyang to rev up the atmosphere of holiday. 
					
					 Public catering outlets in all parts of the country were crowded with people being served with holiday food.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Iron-willed Commander
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Iron-willed Commander
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Sixty-eight years has passed since the birth of the revolutionary regular army in the DPRK.
					 On this occasion, the Korean people recall the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung to found the Korean People's Army, a new type of revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Just after liberating Korea from Japan's colonial rule through armed struggle Kim Il Sung set the foundation of a strong regular army as an indispensable prerequisite for building an independent and sovereign state.
					
					 At that time it was a very difficult task to build a regular army as everything in the country was destroyed by the Japanese imperialists. Some people had asserted that it was hard to found a regular army without other countries' help.
					
					 But the President pushed forward the building of a regular army with his strong faith and pluck, despite such obstruction.
					
					 He saw to it that such military schools as the Pyongyang Institute and the Central Security Officers School were established to produce military and political officers of all services and arms. And he organized the Security Officers Training Centre as the core unit of a regular army and expanded various units of arms and services on this basis.
					
					 Meanwhile, he made a new history of the country's munitions industry, visiting Phyongchon Plain to choose a site for the first munitions factory.
					
					 Under such full preparations, he proclaimed the birth of the KPA, regular armed forces developed from the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, in a military parade held in Pyongyang on Feb. 8, Juche 37 (1948).
					
					 Thanks to the revolutionary armed forces, the Korean people could defeat the U.S. imperialist aggressors, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, displaying the dignity of heroic Korea.
					
					 Indeed, Kim Il Sung is a gifted military strategist and an ever-victorious iron-willed commander as he founded the revolutionary army of new type early in his twenties and set an example of times in the building of revolutionary regular armed forces in his thirties.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Army Building
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Army Building
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- February 8 is the day when the Korean People's Army, the regular armed forces of the DPRK, came into being in liberated Korea as a successor to the Korean People's Revolutionary Army founded on April 25, 1932.
					 On the day the Korean people look back upon the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in building the regular armed forces.
					
					 Only three months after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, he founded the Pyongyang Institute, a parent centre for training military and political cadres needed for building regular armed forces.
					
					 In November Juche 34 (1945), he went to Ryonggang County to choose a site for the institute. And he named it "Pyongyang Institute", advancing tasks for its construction and operation.
					
					 After that he, as its honorary president, gave the first lecture at the institute and made a congratulatory address at its inaugural ceremony.
					
					 Visiting the institute scores of times until February 1948 when the regular revolutionary armed forces came into being, he showed deep care for cadets' military training and living conditions and the management and operation of the institute.
					
					 Under his energetic guidance, the institute produced many military and political officers armed with the Juche-based military ideas and tactics, who made big contributions to winning in the last Korean War provoked by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Today the DPRK has many centers for training competent military and political cadres such as Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics and Kang Kon Military Academy.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blames U.S. for Removing Tok Islets from Korean Map
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blames U.S. for Removing Tok Islets from Korean Map
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the U.S. embassy in Seoul removed Tok Islets from the Korean map posted on its website and marked the East Sea of Korea as the "Sea of Japan" on it, according to the south Korean media.
					 Commenting on it, Minju Joson says the fact goes to prove that it is the real intention of the U.S. to back the Japan's moves to usurp the land of Korea.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is the sworn enemy of the Korean people which has worked hand in glove with Japan to invade Korea throughout history.
					
					 It was how the "Katsura-Taft Treaty" came into being, and the Japanese imperialists' invasion of Korea was also possible as there were the positive support and the patronage of the U.S.
					
					 It is the invariable method of the U.S. for aggression to efficiently use Japan for realizing its strategy for dominating Asia at the cost of the interests of the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. forced the south Korean ruling forces to gloss over the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, the hideous unethical crime of Japan. There is no guarantee that the U.S. would not admonish the transfer of Tok Islets, the part of inalienable territory of the Korean nation, to Japan.
					
					 The U.S., however, should understand that its criminal intention to attain the goal of aggression in violation of sovereignty, dignity and interests of the Korean nation can never work.
					
					 The stand-off with Japan over the past crimes has not ended and Tok Islets are the part of the inviolable territory of Korea which can never be encroached upon.
					
					 The U.S. should immediately stop its gangster-like act of violating the interests of the Korean nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Bid to Justify Humiliating "Agreement" Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Bid to Justify Humiliating "Agreement" Denounced
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "national action for nullifying south Korea-Japan agreement on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and just solution" made public a statement on February 5 in denunciation of the authorities' deceptive action to justify the "agreement" on the sexual slavery.
					 The Foreign Ministry of south Korea made sophism that 14 victims out of 18 sexual slaves and their families showed affirmative response to the content of the "agreement".
					
					 The authorities have so far failed to make even a small effort to listen to the victims of the sexual slavery but as the public criticism of the humiliating "agreement" rose, they staged the farce of meeting them.
					
					 The statement urged the "government" to immediately stop the move to make the victims accept the "agreement" and to mislead the public opinion.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Accused of Justifying Humiliating Act
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Accused of Justifying Humiliating Act
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea issued a statement on Feb. 5 to denounce the conservative authorities for justifying such humiliating act as concealing Japan's past crimes.
					 The statement recalled that the "government" on Feb. 4 made groundless sophism that it heard the demand of victims as regards the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery and most of them positively responded to it.
					
					 Far from getting Japan make an apology and reparation for the crimes related to the sexual slavery, the "government" colluded with Japan, yielding to the U.S. to intensify the military alliance for aggression without a discussion with the victims and is now explaining them about the content of the "agreement" and forcing them to accept it, the statement charged.
					
					 The present regime should stop the base attempt to make Japan's acts of violating justice and ethics be glossed over with a petty amount of money, it said, adding that the present chief executive should declare the cancellation of the collusion at once and get Japan make an official apology and reparation that have been demanded by the victims for decades.

articles.title: Horrible Murderous Acts in S. Korea
articles.content:
Horrible Murderous Acts in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A horrible murderous act was disclosed in Puchon, Kyonggi Province of south Korea, sparking off great public uproar, according to CBS of south Korea on Feb. 3.
					 When his 14 year old daughter who had been out long came back home in March last year, a religionist together with his second wife assaulted her for five hours to death.
					
					 It was also disclosed in Puchon on Jan. 15 that a father killed his seven-year old son and concealed his frozen body for more than three years.

articles.title: Army Building Exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised
articles.content:
Army Building Exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of the DPRK Monday editorially praise the undying exploits for army building performed by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu to mark the 68th anniversary of the development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK by President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Nothing is more vital and important to build the regular armed forces in carving out the destiny of the popular masses, and the might of the revolutionary army depends on the greatness of its supreme commander. 
					
					 The President is the pioneer of the Songun revolution and the invincible and iron-willed commander. 
					
					 Weathering arduous un-trodden way of nation-building, the President laid a foundation of the self-reliant national defence industry and made sure that centers for training military political officers were built to create the ranks of military political leading officers with excellent sons and daughters of the people and with anti-Japanese war fighters as backbone. This helped brilliantly realize the historic cause of building the regular revolutionary armed forces in a short span of time in the hard time right after the liberation of the country. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il was the military genius and great Songun brilliant commander who successfully carried forward the President's idea and exploits of the building of the revolutionary armed forces and developed the Korean People's Army into the powerful elite Paektusan revolutionary army. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il turned the People's Army which started with two pistols into the matchless revolutionary armed forces with the strong might politically, ideologically and in military technique. Their exploits for the Songun revolution will be immortal in the army building history of the world and the history of the DPRK. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the final victory of the Juche revolution is sure as long as there is the heroic Korean People's Army advancing under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un under the uplifted flags bearing the immortal beaming images of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by British Organization in Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung 's Work Carried by British Organization in Bulletin
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The main contents of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Eliminating Dogmatism and Formalism and Establishing Juche in Ideological Work" was carried by the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in its special bulletin "Star of Independence" on January 31.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Syria
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Syria
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Syrian preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on January 31.
					 Fairouz Mousa, director of the Higher Education Department of the Regional Leadership of the Baath Arab Socialist Party of Syria who doubles as chairman of the Syrian Arab-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the sacred revolutionary careers and undying feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il  who made contributions to the accomplishment of the cause of human independence and the development of the friendly relations between the two countries and to organize colorful political and cultural events on the above-said occasions in 2017.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the "Communists of Russia" on February 2.
					 The chairman of the C.C., the "Communists of Russia" was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il on the above-said occasion.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Denmark
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Denmark
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Copenhagen, Denmark on February 2.
					 H. Jacobsen, member of the Leadership of the Communist Party in Denmark, and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee discussed the issue of organizing colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in DR Congo
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in DR Congo
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of DR Congo for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Kinshasa on February 1.
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of DR Congo, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Ecuador
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Ecuador
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- An Ecuadorian preparatory committee for the Meeting of Praising the Great Persons of Mt. Paektu in 2017 was formed in Quito on January 30.
					 Milton Burbano Bohorquez, chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a meeting, lecture, film show and other diverse political and cultural events on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) this year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de respuesta de Nguyen Phu Trong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de respuesta de Nguyen Phu Trong
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio una carta de respuesta que le dirigiera el 30 de enero Nguyen Phu Trong, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Tuvo lugar con exito del dia 20 al 28 de enero de 2016 en Hanoi, capital de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, el XII Congreso del Partido Comunista de Vietnam.
					
					En representacion del CC del PCV, expreso mi sincero agradecimiento al Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea por haber enviado las excelentes felicitaciones al XII Congreso de nuestro Partido.
					
					Esto constituye un gran estimulo a nuestro avance posterior.
					
					El XII Congreso de nuestro partido es un importante evento en la vida politica de toda la nacion vietnamita y sirve de un jalon importante en la causa de innovacion de Vietnam, la incorporacion a la integracion internacional y la causa de construccion socialista.
					
					El Congreso aprobo importantes documentos y eligio nueva Direccion del Partido.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresarle mi sincero agradecimiento por haberme enviado excelentes felicitaciones y fraternidad por mi reeleccion como secretario general del CC del PCV.
					
					Estoy seguro de que las excelentes y tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos partidos y dos Estados y los pueblos de los dos paises se consoliden sin cesar y se desarrollen cada dia mas en el futuro tambien para los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises, la paz, la estabilidad, la cooperacion y la prosperidad de la region y el resto del mundo.

articles.title: Uniformados y civiles de Pyongyang felicitan exitoso lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4
articles.content:
Uniformados y civiles de Pyongyang felicitan exitoso lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung y la explanada frente al Monumento a la Idea Juche el mitin de los uniformados y habitantes de la ciudad de Pyongyang para felicitar el exitoso lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4, satelite de observacion de la Tierra.
					Alli estaban mas de 150 mil personas quienes se congregaron con infinito orgullo y dignidad nacionales de haber sido duenas de una potencia de satelite del Juche que puso de pleno manifiesto la dignidad de gran Corea de Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il y Kim Jong Un.
					
					Tomaron parte en el conclave los funcionarios directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, funcionarios de las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes en esta capital.
					
					Se veian en la localidad para los invitados el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang y los compatriotas en ultramar.
					
					Se dio lectura a la informacion de la Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Cosmico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y hubo discursos de felicitacion.
					
					Kim Ki Nam, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, dijo que el gran jubilo nacional de hoy, o sea, el exitoso lanzamiento de satelite artificial Kwangmyongsong-4 volvio a demostrar patentemente el derecho independiente e inagotable poderio estatal de la potencia del monte Paektu e infunde la infinita conviccion y optimismo sobre la victoria final a todo el pueblo coreano.
					
					Prosiguio que los imperialistas yanquis y sus fuerzas seguidoras acusan al lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4 de "desafio" y "violacion", pero, los satelites artificiales del Juche subiran continua y vigorosamente hacia el cielo azul de la patria.
					
					Yun Tong Hyon, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, senalo que el completo exito de lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4 testimonio una vez mas claramente que gran Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il es una potencia de ciencias y tecnicas y la espacial.
					
					Jang Chol, presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, juro solucionar en el nivel supremo con una velocidad maxima los problemas cientifico-tecnicos para la intensificacion del poderio de defensa nacional del pais, la construccion de potencia economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo con la conviccion revolucionaria del monte Paektu, el espiritu de viento cortante del Paektu y el de autofortalecimiento y asentar en el nivel sofisticado cuanto antes todas las esferas de ciencias y tecnicas.
					
					Jong Yong Nam, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, asevero que se acelerara mas la velocidad de avance de los jovenes que adelantan el radiante porvenir de la prosperidad uniendose mas compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un. Y advirtio que los que se atreven a ofender la dignidad independiente y el derecho legitimo de Corea no evitaran jamas el severo castigo de los jovenes coreanos.

articles.title: Coreanos celebran Ano Nuevo Lunar
articles.content:
Coreanos celebran Ano Nuevo Lunar
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los militares y civiles coreanos acogen con alegria el Ano Nuevo Lunar. 
					Concurrieron a la plaza del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, supremo lugar sagrado del Juche donde estan conservados los cuerpos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, para rendir tributo a estos grandes hombres ante sus imagenes con amplia sonrisa. 
					
					Los militares, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares rindieron el sublime homenaje a los grandes Lideres antecesores ante sus estatuas de bronce en la capitalina colina Mansu y sus imagenes sonrientes levantadas en distintas localidades del pais. 
					
					En los teatros centrales y locales se ofrecieron las funciones artisticas. 
					
					Se realizaron los juegos folcloricos, deportivos y recreativos de los ninos escolares. 
					
					La voladura de cometa y los diversos juegos folcloricos de los ninos escolares realizados en la Plaza Kim Il Sung, la explanada al lado del Arco de Triunfo y otros lugares de la capital aumentaron el ambiente festivo. 
					
					Las bases de servicios gastronomicos sirvieron los variados  platos tipicos de fiesta.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes festejan 8 de febrero
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes festejan 8 de febrero
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el baile festivo de jovenes y estudiantes. 
					El baile se inicio con la interpretacion de la cancion "Jubilo del Pueblo". 
					
					Los bailadores bailaron con el infinito orgullo y alegria de vivir y luchar en la patria socialista que gracias a contar con otro gran hombre sin par ejerce dignamente el derecho a aprovechar el cosmos para fines independientes y pacificos. 
					
					Bailaron al son de las canciones tales como "Tren hacia el frente", "Brillaran tanto la patria como la juventud" y "Marcha del 27 de julio" con el ardiente fervor de seguir avanzando firmemente uniendose mas monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un con el espiritu e impetu de haber conquistado el cosmos, y castigar despiadadamente a quienes se atreven a ofender la dignidad independiente y derechos juridicos de la RPDC.

articles.title: Nadie puede quitar el derecho independiente del pueblo coreano
articles.content:
Nadie puede quitar el derecho independiente del pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ahora todas las calles y lugares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea estan animados por el 68o aniversario del desarrollo del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea como fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares, el Ano Nuevo Lunar 105 (2016) de la Era Juche y la noticia sobre el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4. 
					Citado por la ACNC, el general del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Jo Hong Gun, dijo:
					
					El lanzamiento exitoso de Kwangmyongsong-4 deviene un acontecimiento nacional que ejercio el derecho independiente de la nacion coreana al uso de cosmos con fines pacificos. 
					
					El lanzamiento de satelite realizado por cuarta vez demostro a todo el mundo la ferrea conviccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un de que nadie puede detener la marcha de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados de mi unidad comparten con bailes la alegria con todos los militares y civiles del pais. 
					
					El jefe del Instituto de Justicia de la Academia de Ciencia Sociales, Hong Chol Hwa, dijo que las fuerzas hostiles no pueden dar marcha atras a la rueda de la historia y continuo:
					
					En este mundo no hay ningun pais que recibe la sancion por haber lanzado el satelite artificial. 
					
					Entonces, ?por que los coreanos renunciaran este derecho independiente?
					
					Vean a los jovenes coreanos bailando con gran orgullo. 
					
					En el futuro se lanzaran mucho mas satelites coreanos manifestando la justeza de la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela intento de EE.UU. que tacho islote Tok de mapa coreano
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela intento de EE.UU. que tacho islote Tok de mapa coreano
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Segun un medio de prensa surcoreano, la embajada de Estados Unidos en el Sur de Corea anoto en el mapa coreano usado en su pagina Web el Mar Este de Corea como Mar de Japon y tacho el islote Tok. 
					El hecho muestra que el imperio americano pretende dar luz verde a la ambicion de Japon de usurpar el islote coreano Tok.
					
					Revela el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este lunes y continua:
					
					Historicamente, EE.UU. y Japon, enemigos jurados de la nacion coreana, se confabularon para agredir a Corea. 
					
					Para ese fin, los dos paises firmaron el "Tratado Taft-Katsura" y Japon pudo cometer la invasion a Corea bajo el amparo de EE.UU. 
					
					EE.UU. persigue invariablemente el metodo de agresion de utilizar a Japon al cumplimiento de su estrategia sobre Asia sacrificando los intereses de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Coercio a los gobernantes surcoreanos a encubrir el tremendo crimen de esclavitud sexual de Japon. 
					
					Pues, no hay garantia de que el imperio americano no mandaria a gritos al Sur de Corea a entregar a Japon el islote Tok, sagrado territorio coreano. 
					
					EE.UU. debe tener presente que es irrealizable su intento criminal de lograr la agresion infringiendo la soberania, la dignidad y los intereses de la nacion coreana. 
					
					No ha terminado la confrontacion con Japon para cobrar el precio de su historia criminal. Y el islote Tok es el intangible territorio coreano. 
					
					EE.UU. debe dejar de infringir los intereses de la nacion coreana.
